summary: Normally the beast form power to change into a werewolf is restricted to one cast a day.  This mod changes the power so it can be cast again and again without any sort of cooldown.
descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************

	                TES: Skyrim
	     LFox No Werewolf Form Cooldown v1.0
			 Made by LFox

*****************************************************************

     1. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN

*****************************************************************

1. Extract the mod to the Data folder and enable it via the
launcher or mod manager.

*****************************************************************

     2. Mod Load Order

*****************************************************************

This plugin should be fine anywhere in your load order.  It will
be incompatible with anything that modifies the beast form power
for werewolves.

*****************************************************************

     3. Mod Description

*****************************************************************

Normally the beast form power to change into a werewolf is
restricted to one cast a day.  This mod changes the power so it
can be cast again and again without any sort of cooldown.

There\'s still no way to turn off werewolf form at will but
simply waiting 1 hour seems to be sufficient to turn it off.

*****************************************************************

     4. Version History

*****************************************************************

v1.0
- Made the plugin

*****************************************************************

     5. Contact Info

*****************************************************************

Direct all questions/comments to
hornedreapermjl@hotmail.com
author: LFox
